ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] not playing
ygData.msgSnippet: I have quit playing on several different occasions, a couple of times for 3 months, once for over 4 months. I have always re-activated my account and all my
ygData.messageBody:
I have quit playing on several different occasions, a
couple of times for 3 months, once for over 4 months.
I have always re-activated my account and all my
characters and items were just as I left them. I would
say that if you want to stop playing for the summer,
when you re-activate your account, all will be well.
:)

--- Kittin LovesYou <KittinLovesYou@...>
wrote:
> Quick question regarding the deleted char
> question.... if i cant play for a few months, stop
> payment on the account. How long is my char saved,
> is there a way to save it wehn I feel like coming
> back to play? These next few months are filled with
> many things that will keep me away from home, lots
> of traveling, and I would rather nor waste the money
> when I could keep my chars in tact thru some means.
> Thanks.
>
>
